description: Today i’ll gonna talk about queuing server and how you can you it to optimize processing you big data. First i would like to start with defining the queuing process itself. queuing is putting jobs ...

data.message: you forgot to make abortion method for your jobs you never know when you will need it :) lets say i send a job to the queue that has 80K email as per your queuing server I don't see how you can abort the job if I want to cancel it.
ummm i think this is work can be done by your supervisord command manager
